 2024-01842024-03-01ISED
ActCanadian Tourism Commission Act
PrecisApproval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Tourism of RANDY A. GARFIELD of Stratford, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the re-appointment by the Minister of Tourism of RANDY A. GARFIELD of Stratford, Ontario, as a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Tourism Commission, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
